movie.title: The Fastest
movie.description_intro: Based on a true story of a drug addict who became a triathlon champion and a winner of Ironman competition.
movie.description_full: Based on a true story of a drug addict who became a triathlon champion and a winner of Ironman competition.

movies.title: Virus of the Dead
movies.summary: Zombie horror anthology. What happens when an uncontrollable virus turns the living into the living dead?
movies.description_full: Zombie horror anthology. What happens when an uncontrollable virus turns the living into the living dead?
movies.synopsis: Zombie horror anthology. What happens when an uncontrollable virus turns the living into the living dead?

movies.title: Are You Scared?
movies.summary: Awakening from drug-induced stupors to find that they have been imprisoned by a sadistic psychopath, six teens who are under close observations discover that they have become pawns in a deadly game in which the only hope for survival is to play by the rules and pray for your life.
movies.description_full: Awakening from drug-induced stupors to find that they have been imprisoned by a sadistic psychopath, six teens who are under close observations discover that they have become pawns in a deadly game in which the only hope for survival is to play by the rules and pray for your life.

movies.title: The Stranger Beside Me
movies.summary: While working at a Seattle clinic for women in the 1970s, aspiring crime writer, Ann Rule, unwittingly becomes friends with serial killer Ted Bundy.
movies.description_full: While working at a Seattle clinic for women in the 1970s, aspiring crime writer, Ann Rule, unwittingly becomes friends with serial killer Ted Bundy.
movies.synopsis: While working at a Seattle clinic for women in the 1970s, aspiring crime writer, Ann Rule, unwittingly becomes friends with serial killer Ted Bundy.

movies.title: Warcraft
movies.summary: When the world of the Orcs of Draenor is being destroyed by the evil fel magic that uses life-force, the powerful warlock Gul'dan creates a portal to the world of Azeroth and forms the Horde with members of the Orc clans. He also captures many prisoners to keep the portal open. The king of Azeroth, Llane Wrynn and his brother-in-law, Anduin Lothar are informed by the apprentice of magician Khadgar that he has found fel magic in dead bodies and the king decides to summon the Guardian of Tirisfal, Medivh, to protect his kingdom. Lothar and Khadgar head to Kharazhan to meet Medivh and an ominous shadow points a book out to Khadgar, who takes it and hides. Anduin, Khadgar and Medivh and a group of soldiers are attacked by Orcs and they capture the slave Garona, who is released by King Llane, and she shows them the location of the portal. Garona is contacted by the Orc chief of a clan Durotan that wants to meet King Llane to stop the fel magic. Meanwhile Khadgar learns that the gate was ...
